Articles.Content: Can anyone point me towards a 3d model of the Orion spacecraft and Service Module? Ideally it would originate from NASA, but it doesn't have to. I want to get the locations of the RCS ports on the SM just right for my KSP replica.

I only found a paper model from NASA, but it still might be of some use:

http://www.nasa-usa.de/sites/default/files/files/2014_Orion_Desk_Model.pdf

I only found a paper model from NASA, but it still might be of some use:

http://www.nasa-usa.de/sites/default/files/files/2014_Orion_Desk_Model.pdf

Thanks! Although the model itself wasn't of much use, there were some pictures in the packet that were extremely helpful.
